summary: This bill, the Reimbursements for Immigration Partnerships with Police to allow Local Enforcement Act of 2025 (RIPPLE Act of 2025), proposes to allow the Attorney General to reimburse states and local political subdivisions for costs associated with their employees (officers and others) performing immigration functions. This includes wages, overtime, and salaries. The bill amends section 287(g)(1) of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
